entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Phare 1996. Health care reform program in Hungary. Family doctors sample.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D33: TÁRKI Phare 1996. Health care reform program in Hungary. Family doctors sample.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: data about the practice, patients and living environment; opinion about the inhabitant's satisfaction with the family doctors; surgery equipment; data about medication; preferences of nursing types; patient associations; social appreciation of doctors; foreign language skills
entry.dcterms:subject: social stratification and groupings
social behaviour and attitudes
health care and medical treatment
social conditions and indicators
health condition
person
survey data
cross-section
Multi-stage sampling, national sample representative of the population. The sample was drawn from the register of basic provision practices, of the National Health Care Fund.
face-to-face interview
A
